semantic_identifier: [GOLD-5]: Add segment-scoped positioning template fetching + display in UI
title: Add segment-scoped positioning template fetching + display in UI

sections.text: Implement frontend wiring to call the new positioning template API for the currently selected segment and render the template sections (value props, differentiators, proof points, objections) in the segment detail view. Include loading/empty/error states and ensure the UI falls back to server-provided defaults when a segment has no customized template. Do not implement editing in this ticket—focus on read + presentation so subsequent tickets can layer in inline edits and save behavior.
